com.coremedia.iso
Interface IsoBufferWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractIsoBufferWrapper, IsoBufferWrapperImpl, MultiplexIsoBufferWrapperImpl, RandomAccessFileIsoBufferWrapperImpl
public interface IsoBufferWrapper

Encapsulates access to underlying storage.

readBits

int readBits(int i)
             throws IOException
Reads i bits from the underlying buffers. Caveat: this method always consumes full bytes even if just a bit is readByte!

Parameters:
i - number of bits to readByte, 31 max
Returns:
bitstring value as unsigned int
Throws:
IOException

getReadBitsRemaining

int getReadBitsRemaining()
Gets the number number bits that must be read to be byte aligned again.

Returns:
offset to next byte in bit
